attributes.action: Make the FA take stronger action against racism within the game in this country
attributes.additional_details: Case in point today Danny Rose, saying he cant wait til his career is over because of the racism he and other black players suffered in a recent game, Montenegro should be stopped from playing in competitions until their fans can behave, hopefully that might stop them?!
attributes.background: Racism happens between players too, clubs need to be more than fined for this, the clubs should lose points and fine the perpetrators not the club!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition calling for tougher criminal penalties for racist changing at football matches if that is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259632
